website_summaries.verdict: It may look a little silly, but this bag style diffuser gets the job done for all kinds of flash photos.
pros: Looks like a small pouch, so it will fit nicely over most external flash units
Small and compact, making it easy to carry with you anywhere it's needed
Shape of the pouch can be molded to fit even odd shaped flash units
Stays in place well in windy conditions, which can be a problem for flat diffusers
cons: Thicker materials than some other diffusers, so it may end up blocking too much light or not spreading it as evenly as you'd like

customer_reviews.title: works great but hard to install
customer_reviews.text: I also use Sto-Fen OmniBounce. which goes on and off easily. This one has elastic and take two hands and some force to put on the flash (Sunpak PZ42X, by the way). Once on, it is fairly secure but can come off if bumped. The Fotasy does work well as a diffuser. Not clear from the picture is that one side is black and the inside surfaceis shiny so it puts more light forwards. The Sto-Fen style diffusers are 360 degrees, so in a small room, the results are softer, but with more light loss. Since it crushes flat, it is handier than an OmnBounce, so I will always take it along.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Tissue Paper Not Required
customer_reviews.text: Before the widespread use of light modifiers, I relied on taping a layer of tissue paper over my Vivitar 283/285 in order to soften the flash output. I guess now I don't have to go through the process ever again with this accessory. Again, not quite for everyone but downright cheap and effective. I will definitely buy a few more once as I update my older flashes. People continually comment on my use of soft lighting and how can they do the same thing. Imitation is flattery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits in my pocket easily!... arrived on time and in new condition. Will probably order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: JG (Highflyer)Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. I honestly feel like they’re better products on the market but for the price they’re pretty good
customer_reviews.author: April M Seay

customer_reviews.title: Diffusion is kind of weak, but the quality is fine
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fine. The fit is fine. I just didn't get as much actual diffusion out of this as I'd hoped. You'll still get hotspots and a pretty directional light. That's not shocking since the diffusion surface area in front of the flash head is pretty small. Still, I hoped it would be more useful. I think one of those milky plastic diffusers that look like an oversized ice cube would probably do as well or better.
customer_reviews.author: Max RockbinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to install and folds flat, so you can easily stuff it in a pocket when not in use. It is also very light, so it adds minimal weight to the flash. It is not the best diffuser I've ever had, but it is pretty good and fairly inexpensive. I also have a Professional Lambency Flash Diffuser (Clear), which I think does a better job with the light, but is significantly heavier.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well With Fujifilm EF-42 Flash....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my Fujifilm EF-42 flash. Fits perfectly and works extremely well for softening the harshness of direct flash. A big advantage is that it folds almost flat and takes up virtually no space in the camera bag or pocket. I am very pleased with the purchase and service. To be honest and for the price, how can you not be happy?
customer_reviews.author: Gee Emm

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent soft box for the price. I got it because it literally takes up no space in my bag unlike the molded plastic diffusers. So far it does the job just as it should. The elastic band takes a little stretching effort to fit it on some of the larger flash units but that is really not a bad thing. At least it wont be falling off every time the wind blows. Quality seems pretty decent too. Not a bad diffuser for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My go-to diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: My go-to diffuser. Stays on, reliable and allows for soft light. If I use one at all, I use this one compared to the others I have on hand. Folds nicely down if I have to slip into a pocket or bag. Highly recommend it and I may buy another one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Greene

customer_reviews.title: don't be diffused...
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a 3 only because there are better products out there for the same price. This diffuser works fine. It has an elastic band that grips around the flash unit, however it will take about 10 seconds to get it on. The build quality is ok as the stitching is poor in some areas...I use it on a neewer flash head...
customer_reviews.author: Hoop

customer_reviews.title: merp derp
customer_reviews.text: While I was not expecting miracles from this product I was still dissapointed. While yes, this does soften the flash a tad, I still get very hard shadows in my images. If the diffusing material was doubled or trippled in thickness I feel that it would be adequate. Back to bouncing my flash
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: I Like this little guy!
customer_reviews.text: It works I tested it with different lenses and I just like it, is not expensive and is not the most professional diffuser but for the price it works fine, Plus I am one of those who takes care of almost everything, so I think is going to last me for a while unless I loose it. I do recommend it and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Forays LD-1 soft box.
customer_reviews.text: Even though all of the photos of the soft box attachment show the black portion on the bottom, I regularly use it inverted to diffuse light for close-up photography. The light is softened and focused closer to the subject.
customer_reviews.author: Art-Knoxville, TN

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Small easy portable flash deflector. Gives soft box effect in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Marmik D

customer_reviews.title: Like it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like this an use it often for diffusing/softening flash for 10 ft and closer. Much more and I prefer to bounce flash off a ceiling or wall. Only gripe is the elastic is pretty loose...I put a rubber band around it to assure it stays put. Very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Percell

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: did filtered some light but to make them smoothly scatter is a no go, but for this price i use it with other filter as well, and this thing can be fold and store easier than plastic cap , so that a plus. but i wouldnt buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SumYumGai

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: 2nd attempt at a small soft box. I am not sure how i feel about this one. it works as promised but not as smooth of a surface as i wanted. quailty was good. i believe the problem lies with me. i am expecting too much bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: dan w

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, even compared to some other larger diffusers I use. There is a flaw in the stitching on mine so it doesn't open up all the way on one side when placed on the flash. If not for this, I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works best during cocktail hour.
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t have a grid for your lens then this is perfect for you! I use it all the time at weddings for candid shots.

customer_reviews.title: but it did arrive on time and does fit my flash unit nice and tight
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but it did arrive on time and does fit my flash unit nice and tight. I do not expect there to be any problems with its operating as expected
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: great soft box
customer_reviews.text: like this soft box. its hard to put on at first but once its on, it gets the job done. and there no sticky stuff to put on ur flash so its makes it easy to switch it out from speed light to speed light.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Croom

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits in my pocket easily!... arrived on time and in new condition. Will probably order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have another soft box, but this one is easier to put on the flash, and I like the way it diffuses the light.
customer_reviews.author: KanDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yet sweet
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect fit, but it definitely does what it is suppose to! Great product! It adds a taste of professionalism as well.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison M. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Does just what it is suppose to do, and at a very low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Interesting....to say the least
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I had big hopes for this product (still do). It will not stay put on my flash. In the picture shown, it looks like it stays firm with the elastic band (it does not). It fly's off every time I put it on. I did take a picture using it (I held it with my hands) and it does work so I am going to put some double sided Velcro on the elastic band and the flash and see if that helps. I plan on keep it, but only wish if the elastic were not so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkster

customer_reviews.title: It does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Notthing too special here. It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dre'

customer_reviews.title: Just works.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Softens the flash. Economical for the amateur photographer too.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: love this it is perfect i'm going to purchase another one for my other flash its awesome fits perfect :)
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, cheap and simple, but efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for dusk situations. The diffuser isn't diffuse enough for night shots, but it helped me capture sunset fill light shots with soft flash. Also very easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Hau Soong

customer_reviews.title: The diffuser "darken" the pictures too much I did not like it I will give it another try opening the ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my Flash Gun Bower model SFD728C that I use it with my Canon T3i and Rebel Ti.This flashgun is dedicated for these cameras ! The diffuser "darken" the pictures too much I did not like it I will give it another try opening the F lens more but it should work in auto! the material of this diffuser is good so is the elastic band that attaches to the flash gun. well built .probably the diffuser will work for somebody else that have different flash gun. JV
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Handy but weak defusing.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to put on, to take off and to carry. However, the cloth is not thick enough for good defusing. For day time fill light is OK but not for indoor or night photo.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainJames

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this little cover and it works as advertised. It takes some work to get on and off but its really not a problem
customer_reviews.author: R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally helped with my portraiture pictures it’s inexpensive and hardly takes up any space in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Fabby

customer_reviews.title: Nice way, but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I like this for my attached flash for my film cameras. It works best on attached flash. It lowers the red eye and bleaching effect some flashes can make. I like it for portraits and interior shots.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Babic

customer_reviews.title: Works very well on my Canon 270EX. I kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on my Canon 270EX. I kept losing the flash domes, but I store my flash inside and always have it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It softens the flash and it's very easy to carry keep in my camera bag all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A.

customer_reviews.title: works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got here in prompt time and works great! I've been using it almost daily for a month now and everything is just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's slightly better than the bare flash
customer_reviews.text: It takes effort to slip onto your flash, and works just as well as the hard plastic diffuser. It's so simple that it shouldn't cost more than $2.
customer_reviews.author: Seeking pixels

customer_reviews.title: Solid Diffuser for Flash
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my Yongnuo flash and it diffuses well. Much better idea than dropping cash on something tacky like Gary Fong!
customer_reviews.author: S. Connolly

customer_reviews.title: A little better than bounce flash
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect too much from this, it's just a little better than just point your flash up and using the bounce card. Now, is it $7 better, sure :)
customer_reviews.author: Nomad8888

product_meta.title: (2 Packs) Fotasy Soft Universal Cloth Flash Bounce Diffuser Cap for Flashgun Speedlite, Universial Flash Diffuser fits Canon Metz Nikon Nissin Olympus Panasonic Pentax Sigma Sony Sunpak Flashes
product_meta.description: This universal flash diffuser easily attaches to almost any flash unit. It disperses the light over a wider area for a softer, more balanced and natural effect than you didn't use before. It helps to reduce hard background shadows and eliminates the annoying red eye effect. Size: 76mm x 71mm x 30mm Package Contents: 2 x Soft Mini Diffusers
feature_bullets: It will soften harsh shadows and reduce hot spots
Easy to use and carry, it is foldable, thus you can fold it and bring it with you wherever and whenever you need.
Buy one and use it with most of your flash units

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
